website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for beautiful, spacious Christmas stockings, look no further. These burlap stockings feature quality and designs perfect for the holiday season.
pros: Not only do these 18-inch stockings have ample room for goodies, but they are made of rugged material and available with several adorable Santa images
They also look awesome hanging on the mantel and fit nicely with decor
cons: At least one report of a stocking arriving with small holes
but many more happy customers brag about the quality of these festive stockings

customer_reviews.title: A really well made stocking that'll last. Was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: A really well made stocking that'll last. Was expecting something of lesser quality for the price but pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Mama3x

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy!!! Trust me, get them. The quality is there, made decently, affordable and quick delivery. Perfect for decoration because, let’s face it, these are a good price and can be used traditionally by filling with goodies. Also, because you get all 3 together, they match well with each other without being exact matches. Really happy I procrastinated this year and stumbled upon these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: My original handmade stocking I have had since I was a child was destroyed , I have spent many Christmases without one , now this beautiful Santa Stocking is mine and hangs with my husbands and children’s that I made , it is so beautifully made and the perfect size ! Thank you for my Christmas Morning Santa Stocking ! Beyond grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are so cute! I was nervous about ordering stockings online but I hadn’t seen any in stores that I loved. I got 5 of these and alternated the green and red. Since we don’t have a mantle, I used command hooks and covered the hooks with big bows. It looks great, they’re wonderfully made and they came quickly as well! Very durable and they hold all of the stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and strong
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can't come home for Christmas, but wanted her stocking, so I ordered this one for her, it's beautiful very well made, she'll love it when she gets it. Lots of room for santa to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of it
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it. So when I opened it, I was very excited. I used it this past Christmas ONE TIME and it ripped! I did not even over-stuff this stocking. I actually only had a few items in it. I was super disappointed to find a hole in it the next day when we were putting our goodies away. It was a great value, but now I know why. Two stars only because it looks nice. I would have given 4 stars if it did not rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured- super cute! Seems well made, and I believe it will last for many years to come. It's our daughter's first Christmas, and I looked through several options to find something cute but affordable- I'm quite pleased with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: AJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value (and Cuteness!)
customer_reviews.text: The stocking is just as cute as the photo depicts and the quality seems excellent. We used it this year for our new daughter-in-law and I was able to stitch her name on the cuff to personalize it since I had no time to have it embroidered. Thus I can assure you, dear reader, that you are getting a very nice stocking at a very nice price. Delivery as promised, too.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stocking
customer_reviews.text: This burlap stocking is beautiful. I ordered the one with the image of Santa on it & it's a really nice piece. The reason for my purchase was that each person in my family had a burlap stocking... and then I had a baby. Of course she needed her own stocking, but all of the others were purchased from the same store & that was years ago. So I went online looking for a stocking that would fit in the "family" of stockings I already have for everyone else. The quality of the stocking is very nice. I'm 100% satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B J

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence, it will last for many seasons.
customer_reviews.text: Being on the older side of life the word burlap conjures up the feeling of something totally different but because of the picture and the price I took a chance and I’m so happy I did. This stocking is soft, it’s fun, it’s durable and large enough to stuff plenty of surprises. Plenty of space to glitter/glue a name too.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute stocking! I was struggling to find a good quality one for my newest son so looked to amazon. It’s very good quality. Thick material. I can tell it will hold up for many Christmases. It’s not a fuzzy or fleece type material, feels more like smooth burlap. I really like it.

product_meta.title: iPEGTOP 18" Burlap Christmas Stocking, Large Craft Socks Traditional Santa Stockings Snowflake Decorations Xmas Tree Rustic Ornaments Red Cuff
product_meta.description:
ipegtop is proud to provide quality Christmas ornaments to complement almost any themed Christmas decoration with the perfect ornament. 
When the holiday season rolls around, nothing looks better hanging from your fireplace or mantle than a personalized Christmas stocking.
This sophisticated and classic Christmas stocking is certain to look stunning hanging from your mantle or wall.
feature_bullets: Stockings are 18" tall and come with a ready-to-hang fabric loop. Design is on one side only
This decorative holiday stocking collection will be a lovely addition to your Christmas ornaments, tree and other home festive decor
The stockings are made of high quality burlap with delicate appearance and exquisite workmanship
Give your children the unforgettable excitement of discovering a beautiful stocking filled with small surprises
They will make a real statement on fireplaces, staircases, at the end of the bed and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
